title: Trindade e Vasconcelos (Joaquim da)
body: He was born in the town of Machico in 1825 and died in Funchal on April 14, 1906. He was a bachelor of law from the University of Coimbra and was a lawyer in the district of Funchal for many years. He was also the president of the Municipal Chamber. In 1867, he published a 40-page booklet entitled Projecto de lei regulamenta* do contrato de colónia ou parceria agrícola na Uha da Madeira, in which the late Dr. José António de Almada collaborated.

Joaquim da Trindade e Vasconcelos: Lawyer, president of the Municipal Chamber

1867: Published the booklet 'Projecto de lei regulamenta* do contrato de colónia ou parceria agrícola na Uha da Madeira'
